ComicInfo.Summary: A skeleton is discovered at Springdale High School and its discovery leads to an investigation that may spell a lot of trouble for Robbie Baldwin’s parents who are definitely acting strange about the discovery. So Robbie has to figure out what is going on in “The Ghost of Springdale High.” Script by Steve Ditko & Roger Stern and art by Steve Ditko & Dan Adkins.
